nodes.bodyText: Done because you can end up with multiple copies of the same file (especially since there is some inferring of file names going on)
Change the return type of this method to Collection<String> and you don't need to wrap the LinkedHashSet into another collection
Sure, but then I need to change all the rest as well. I don't think it's worth it TBH
Well, if you look what calls it you'll see it's already expecting Collection<String> so it's not a huge change
I'll give it another look, but I thought it was List everywhere.
